chats.question: Entity Base
Component Base
chats.answer:
* Component part of Entity Component System in game engine  
* This type defines data model and content of Entity  
```plaintext
|-- engine_api/
|   |-- src/
|       |-- ecs/
|           |-- component/
|               |-- ClassType.ts
|               |-- IComponent.ts
```
```plaintext
|-- engine/
|   |-- src/
|       |-- ecs/
|           |-- component/
|               |-- Component.ts
```
```typescript
export type ClassType<T> = abstract new (...args: any[]) => T
```
```typescript
export default interface IComponent {
  update(deltaTime: number): void
  render(deltaTime: number): void
  get id(): string
  set id(id: string)
}
```
```typescript
import { IComponent } from 'engine_api'

export default abstract class Component implements IComponent {
  private _id!: string

  get id(): string {
    return this._id
  }

  set id(id: string) {
    this._id = id
  }

  update(_deltaTime: number) {}

  render(_deltaTime: number) {}
}
```

System Base
chats.answer:
```plaintext
|-- engine_api/
|   |-- src/
|       |-- ecs/
|           |-- system/
|               |-- ISystem.ts
|        |-- IStartable .ts
|        |-- IUpdateable .ts
```
```typescript
export default interface IStartable {
  start(): void
}
```
```typescript
export default interface IUpdateable {
  update(deltaTime: number): void
}
```
```typescript
import IStartable from '../IStartable'
import IUpdateable from '../IUpdateable'

export default interface ISystem extends IStartable, IUpdateable {}
```
```plaintext
|-- engine/
|   |-- src/
|       |-- ecs/
|           |-- system/
|               |-- base/
|                   |-- IRegisterEntityById.ts
|                   |-- ISystemManager.ts
|                   |-- SystemBase.ts
|                   |-- SystemManager.ts
```
```typescript
export default interface IRegisterEntityById {
  registerEntityById(entityId: string): void
}
```
```typescript
import { IManager, ISystem, IUpdateable } from 'engine_api'

export default interface ISystemManager
  extends IUpdateable,
    IManager<ISystem> {}
```
```typescript
import { IEntity, IStartable, IManager, IUpdateable } from 'engine_api'
import IRegisterEntityById from './IRegisterEntityById'

export default abstract class SystemBase
  implements IStartable, IUpdateable, IRegisterEntityById
{
  protected _entity!: IEntity

  constructor(protected readonly _entityManager: IManager<IEntity>) {}

  registerEntityById(entityId: string): void {
    this._entity = this._entityManager.getStrict(entityId)
  }

  start() {}

  update(_deltaTime: number) {}
}
```
```typescript
import { ISystem } from 'engine_api'
import ISystemManager from './ISystemManager'
import MapManager from '../../entity/manager/MapManager'

export default class SystemManager
  extends MapManager<ISystem>
  implements ISystemManager
{
  update(deltaTime: number): void {
    for (const system of this.values()) {
      system.update(deltaTime)
    }
  }
}
```

chats.question: PlayerKick
chats.answer:
```plaintext
|-- engine/
|   |-- src/
|       |-- ecs/
|           |-- system/
|               |-- PlayerKick.ts
```
```typescript
import { IEntity, IEntityManager, IEventSystem } from 'engine_api'
import { KeyboardEvent, KeyboardKeys } from './keyboard/keyboardTypes'
import SystemBase from './base/SystemBase'
import IKeyboardEventData from './keyboard/IKeyboardEventData'
import RigidBody from '../component/RigidBody'
import Vector2 from '../../math/vector/Vector2'

export default class PlayerKick extends SystemBase {
  protected _ball!: IEntity
  private ball_rb!: RigidBody
  private player_rb!: RigidBody

  constructor(
    entityManager: IEntityManager,
    private readonly _eventSystem: IEventSystem
  ) {
    super(entityManager)
    this._eventSystem.subscribe(KeyboardEvent, this.kick.bind(this))
  }

  registerBallById(entityId: string): void {
    this._ball = this._entityManager.getStrict(entityId)
  }

  start(): void {
    this.ball_rb = this._ball.getComponentStrict(RigidBody)
    this.player_rb = this._entity.getComponentStrict(RigidBody)
  }

  private kick(data: IKeyboardEventData) {
    if (data.key !== KeyboardKeys.z) return
    console.log('handleZKey')
    const vn = Vector2.getNew(this.player_rb.velocity).normalize()
    this.ball_rb.velocity = vn.multiply(250)
    console.log(this.ball_rb.velocity)
  }
}
```

chats.question: MouseInput
Api
chats.answer:
```plaintext
|-- engine
|   |-- src
|       |-- ecs
|           |-- system
|               |-- keyboard
|                   |-- IKeyboardEventData.ts
|                   |-- keyboardTypes.ts
```
```typescript
import { KeyboardKey } from './keyboardTypes'

export default interface IKeyboardEventData {
  entityId: string
  key: KeyboardKey
}
```
```typescript
export type KeyAction = () => void

export type KeyActionMap = { [key: string]: KeyAction }

export type KeyEvent = 'KeyDown' | 'KeyUp'

export const KeyEvents: { [key in KeyEvent]: key } = {
  KeyDown: 'KeyDown',
  KeyUp: 'KeyUp',
}

export type KeyActionWithParam<T> = (data: T) => void

export type KeyActionWithParamMap<T> = { [key: string]: KeyActionWithParam<T> }

export const KeyboardEvent = 'KeyboardEvent'

export type KeyboardKey = 'q' | 'e' | 'z' | 'x'

export const KeyboardKeys: { [key in KeyboardKey]: key } = {
  q: 'q',
  e: 'e',
  z: 'z',
  x: 'x',
}
```

chats.question: Engine Detector
Engine Collision System
ball_game->collision
ball_game->collision_handler
ball_game->GameSystemBuilder
Entity Loader v2
InitLogicSystem
RenderSystem
Entity Data Loader
